short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides user convenient search options if the navigate to a website that is missing or unavailable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helpful extension that offers the user search options to help them find a similar site if the website they visit is unavailable.
